department.en: Institute of Materials Science and Engineering
department.ch: 材料科學與工程研究所碩士班

goal.en:
Before the completion of this course each student should be able to:
1. Describe basic X-ray physics
2. Understand basic principles of crystallography
3. Understand basic principles of X-ray diffraction
4. Describe the fundamentals of measurement methods related to X-ray diffraction
goal.ch: 本課程目標為介紹X光繞射與結晶學之基本概念，此外並將介紹X光繞射在材料分析上之應用，除了引導同學對X光繞射物理與應用有初步的概念外、亦讓同學對其在產業界的應用有所瞭解。

content.en:
1. Fundamentals of X-ray physics
2. Introduction to crystallography
3. Basic theory of X-ray diffraction
4. Experimental methods of X-ray diffraction
5. Basic applications of X-ray diffraction
content.ch:
1. X光基本物理
2. 結晶學簡介
3. X光繞射基本概念
4. X光繞射之實驗方法
5. X光繞射之基本應用

textbook.en: Elements of X-ray Diffraction, Cullity ＆ Stock 3rd ed. (Prentice Hall)
textbook.ch: Elements of X-ray Diffraction, Cullity ＆ Stock 3rd ed. (Prentice Hall)
